Product Name: Lip Smacker Coca-Cola Flavored Balm, 8 Count, Flavors Coke, Cherry Vanilla Sprite, Root Beer, Orange Fanta, Grape Strawberry Fanta

Reviews.Review Text: I love these. I bought them for me and I use them all the time. I’m in the wind a lot and need to protect my lips. I have a couple to friends. I use them whenever I want something sweet. It’s almost necessary for the dieters. Love.
These are great stocking fillers. My daughter loves them.
Great product and fast delivery. Highly recommended
Lip smackers are good quality and leave a nice smell and taste but not overly hydrating
Great value pack. Love all of these flavours
Great product, flavors are amazing! And very real.
All good. Product arrived quickly and as promised.
These cola lip balms smell scrumptious
These lip balms taste just great and teens love them. They do a great job caring for lips
